DE.name: Renewable Energy Act (EEG)
DE.description: A major German law that promotes the generation of renewable energy through a feed-in tariff scheme.

DE.name: Combined Heat and Power Act (KWKG)
DE.description: Promotes the use of combined heat and power (CHP) systems to increase energy efficiency.

FR.name: Energy Transition Law for Green Growth
FR.description: A comprehensive law aiming to reduce France's greenhouse gas emissions and increase the share of renewable energy.

FR.name: Multiannual Energy Plan (PPE)
FR.description: Sets the priorities for the French government's energy policy for the next 10 years.

US.name: Inflation Reduction Act (IRA)
US.description: Includes major provisions to boost clean energy and reduce carbon emissions through tax credits and investments.
